# 预览图片的操作栏，悬浮样式不太对

`improvement`

### Reproduction link

[https://ant.design/components/image-cn](https://ant.design/components/image-cn)

### Steps to reproduce

点击图片预览，鼠标移至操作图标上方

### What is expected?

高亮操作图标

### What is actually happening?

操作图标变灰

| Environment | Info   |
| ----------- | ------ |
| antd        | 5.8.2  |
| React       | 17     |
| System      | win10  |
| Browser     | chrome |
